title: I had enough RP for 2 legendaries. And decided to test my Luck.

embed.description: Here was my attempt at getting lucky at the Legendary Snowball. *Buy a legendary, and get a random skin. If its legendary you roll again.* 1850 RP Tristana. 520 RP Jax. 975 RP. Prime Time Draven. 975 RP Deb Jayce. 1850 RP Final Boss Veigar. 750 RP RP, Fnatic gragas.

body:
What did you guys get from the snowball run?
In total I got -

1850 RP Tristana.
520 RP Jax.
975 RP. Prime Time Draven.
975 RP Deb Jayce.
1850 RP Final Boss Veigar.
750 RP RP, Fnatic gragas.

Total: 6920 RP. I may or may not have gotten the prices off Im sorry If I did.

replies.body: wait what. how was prime time 1 ip

not if he grabbed it on his oce account.

and if it was pbe everything would be 1 ip
No idea, but I got him for 1 IP. and it counted as a legendary, so I got another skin too XD
Send my friend a mystery gift and het got 2 legendary skins and a normal. Magnificent twisted fate (legendary), forecast janna (legendary), slayer pantheon.

that moment you do gift for gift 4 times. get 2 520 skins, a 750 and lollipoppy

they get 3 legendaries an ultimate and all 3 academy skins.
You must have been one of the very lucky ones....:?
